name: TNZMART 25 Note Xylophone Wooden Glockenspiel Xylophone with Mallet Professional Percussion Instrument (Xylophone with stand)
short_description: The 25 note xylophone is made of high quality wooden. Compared with other xylophones, annatto xylophones have better and clearer sound quality, and the sound is louder and longer.

The keys of the 25-tone xylophone are polished and rounded in shape, with smooth edges without burrs, which will not hurt hands. And the keys are marked with corresponding notes to convenient for users to play the melody.

The 25 note wooden glockenspiel is equipped with mallets which is easy to handle. It can cultivate players' music cells, exercise coordination for hands to eyes, and promote development of left and right brain.
One of the wooden xylophones comes with an adjustable stand so you can adjust the height as needed. The stand can be shrinked up, so convenient to storage and reduce the occupied area.
The xylophone for adults can be used as a teaching instrument in the stage of enlightenment education and music education in schools. It also can be played in professional bands
